headline: Linode postmortem for August 1-2 Connectivity Issues London and Frankfurt
description:
HN won't let me post the direct link as it's the same as yesterday's story about the downtime.

Linode has published a postmortem on their connectivity / power issues in London and Frankfurt. TLDR; their edge routers were incorrectly connected to redundant power supplies and they missed notifications from their co-lo provider about routine maintenance.

https://status.linode.com/incidents/8qnvzrfz7hg2
headline_zh-Hans: 8月1-2日Linode后记 伦敦和法兰克福的连接问题
headline_zh-Hant: 8月1-2日Linode後記 倫敦和法蘭克福的連接問題
description_zh-Hans:
HN不会让我发布直接链接，因为它与昨天关于停机时间的报道相同。

Linode发布了一份关于他们在伦敦和法兰克福的连接/电源问题的报告。TLDR；他们的边缘路由器被错误地连接到冗余电源上，而且他们错过了他们的联合网络供应商关于例行维护的通知。

https://status.linode.com/incidents/8qnvzrfz7hg2
description_zh-Hant:
HN不會讓我發佈直接鏈接，因為它與昨天關於停機時間的報道相同。

Linode發佈了一份關於他們在倫敦和法蘭克福的連接/電源問題的報告。TLDR；他們的邊緣路由器被錯誤地連接到冗餘電源上，而且他們錯過了他們的聯合網絡供應商關於例行維護的通知。

https://status.linode.com/incidents/8qnvzrfz7hg2
